RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA PERLA NERA stalked the pace for three quarters of a mile, rallied at the top of the stretch and drew even, drew off late under mild right handed urging. TESHIMA set the pace with a clear lead, was hooked at the top of the stretch, could not match strides late with the winner but was second best. PARTY AT GRANTS was off slowly and rushed up three wide on the first turn contented throughout in a good effort. SISTER CODE never far back early, faded on the far turn. DINAH JO was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, faded on the fart turn

ENTRY.NAME: La Perla Nera
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked the pace, rallied at the top of the stretch, drew off, ri

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: was off slowly and rushed up three wide on the first turn

ENTRY.NAME: Teshima
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace with a clear lead, was hooked at the top of the stre

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 19. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHANGHAI ROYALTY dueled on the lead while between horses, drew clear in the stretch and widened late under mild urging. BOLD NICKY was well placed just off the speed, rallied in the stretch, could not challenge the winner but was second best. GHOSTLY REVIVAL dueled on the lead from the inside and faltered in the stretch. MY TWO JAKES stumbled at the start and was no factor. HONEYBEE STINGS dueled three wide early and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled at the start and was no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: was well placed just off the speed, rallied, in the stretch and w

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead from the inside and faltered in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, on the lead while between horses, drew clear in the stret

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybee Stings
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, three wide and was through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAMANRASSETT was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated on the front end while racing off the rail, repulsed a bid at the half mile pole, drew clear on the far turn and widened in the stretch under firm handling. GOOD IDEA pressed the winner three wide, could not challenge late but was up for place. WISE KHOZAN pressed the winner on the inside and went evenly late. ROSAS WAY never far back early, lacked a late response. OPEN OUT allowed to settle, failed to menace. IMTHEPRINCE showed little and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Imtheprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, and trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated,

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to menace,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the winner on the inside and went evenly late,

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the winner three wide, could not challenge late but was

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, lacked late response,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 35. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS ELLIE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened late under mild urging to win as much the best. LADYBUGGIN chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but was second best. DEE'S KY WILDCAT hopped at the start, raced three wide, lacked a late bid and went evenly. WICKED REESE had good position early and gradually weakened. OHIO LADY saved ground and was no menace. SEE YA SISTA was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: See Ya Sista
ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground and was no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Reese
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position early and gradually weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUT RATES was well placed early, rallied, in the stretch three wide, drew clear in mid stretch and remained clear late under strong handling, CHECK OUT LINE was unhurried early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch, split horses and finished well. SWEET EMPIRE was bumped at the start, raced four wide throughout and finished willingly in a good effort. CONGRATS JENSEN vied for the lead throughout and held well in the stretch drive. PROPHETESS was unhurried early, swung five wide in the stretch and rallied. MY BELLE MICHELLE was never far back, rallied in the stretch on the inside and hung late. DYNA'S HOLIDAY allowed to settle, failed to menace. OPULENT contended for a half, then gave way in the stretch. SPEAK LIGHTLY saved ground and was no threat. PAYTON PRETTY dueled on the lead for half, then stopped in the stretch and bled.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, angled out four wide in the stretch, split h

ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and rallied,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPLEMAN ALLEY stalked the early pace, rallied in mid stretch three wide, drew clear late under firm handling. UPTOWN GUY dueled on the lead while between horses, was outfinished late but held place. KAPHAVATA dueled on the lead three wide and weakened slightly late. FANELLI was allowed to settle early, swung four wide in the stretch and rallied. JOYFUL CANDY was no factor. ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED was outrun. COAL TOWN ROAD dueled early on the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAY MAGIC dueled on the lead from the inside, gained a clear lead on the turn, opened up in mid stretch and lasted late under strong handling. GRIZABELLA was never far back, rallied in the stretch four wide, closed fast and just missed BEST OF YOU raced wide throughout, improved late while no threat. SARAH JANE had good position on the inside and went evenly late. BEEBLEGEE allowed to settle, failed to menace. NORTHERN JOURNEY was unhurried early, rallied was in tight on the turn, put in a bid and flattened out. PROPER ETIQUETTE dueled on the early lead and weakened in the stretch. ST PATTY'S SONG was no factor. SO GO MY LUCEILLE contended early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOADED ONCE MORE was never far back, rallied on the turn three wide, closed determinedly and was up in the final strides. SQUID dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear in the stretch and was caught in the last jumps. SOMUCHSUGAR was allowed to settle early, swung four wide in the stretch and finished well. POLISHED GEM dueled on the inside and weakened in the stretch. FLAT DISCOUNT was well placed on the rail and faded in the stretch. SUSHI Q had brief foot and was through early. AUJARA stumbled at the start and lost her rider. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action
